Subject: Is it possible to alter the subject line of the email that gets sent out for a temp password?
Description:
Hi Team,

We're wondering if we can edit the email subject line of the emails that get sent out for the temp passwords. The intention is to add a number so that we can sort them easier in our ticketing system. 

Kind Regards,
Andrej.
What_We_Know__c:
customer asked if they can change the subject line of the email that gets sent out for a temp password
I let him know that unfortunately it can't be customised
Next_Steps__c: waiting on the customer to reply
